casebody.data:
Joleando Lyndell JONES
v.
HARNETT COUNTY DISTRICT COURT, Jacqualyn L. Lee. No. 410P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 28, 2016. Joleando Lyndell Jones, for Jones, Joleando Lyndell. Vernon K. Stewart, District Attorney.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 9th of December 2015 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Harnett County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016."
